title: Things Are Bad
dc:creator: WBUR
description: With increasing political divide and heightened civil unrest in the United States, many fear that it will culminate in a second civil war. We explore the likelihood of that scenario and hear from someone who thinks America is already in the midst of collapse.
itunes:author: WBUR
